Now these are the generations<S>8435</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>, who is Edom<S>123</S>.
Esau<S>6215</S> took<S>3947</S> his wives<S>802</S> of the daughters<S>1323</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>; Adah<S>5711</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Elon<S>356</S> the Hittite<S>2850</S>, and Aholibamah<S>173</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Anah<S>6034</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Zibeon<S>6649</S> the Hivite<S>2340</S>;
And Bashemath<S>1315</S> Ishmael's<S>3458</S> daughter<S>1323</S>, sister<S>269</S> of Nebajoth<S>5032</S>.
And Adah<S>5711</S> bare<S>3205</S> to Esau<S>6215</S> Eliphaz<S>464</S>; and Bashemath<S>1315</S> bare<S>3205</S> Reuel<S>7467</S>;
And Aholibamah<S>173</S> bare<S>3205</S> Jeush<S>3274</S>, and Jaalam<S>3281</S>, and Korah<S>7141</S>: these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>, which were born<S>3205</S> unto him in the land<S>776</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>.
And Esau<S>6215</S> took<S>3947</S> his wives<S>802</S>, and his sons<S>1121</S>, and his daughters<S>1323</S>, and all the persons<S>5315</S> of his house<S>1004</S>, and his cattle<S>4735</S>, and all his beasts<S>929</S>, and all his substance<S>7075</S>, which he had got<S>7408</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>; and went<S>3212</S> into the country<S>776</S> from the face<S>6440</S> of his brother<S>251</S> Jacob<S>3290</S>. <sup>persons: Heb. souls</sup>
For their riches<S>7399</S> were more<S>7227</S> than that they might dwell<S>3427</S> together<S>3162</S>; and the land<S>776</S> wherein they were strangers<S>4033</S> could<S>3201</S> not bear<S>5375</S> them because<S>6440</S> of their cattle<S>4735</S>.
Thus dwelt<S>3427</S> Esau<S>6215</S> in mount<S>2022</S> Seir<S>8165</S>: Esau<S>6215</S> is Edom<S>123</S>.
And these are the generations<S>8435</S> of Esau<S>6215</S> the father<S>1</S> of the Edomites<S>123</S> in mount<S>2022</S> Seir<S>8165</S>: <sup>the Edomites: Heb. Edom</sup>
These are the names<S>8034</S> of Esau's<S>6215</S> sons<S>1121</S>; Eliphaz<S>464</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Adah<S>5711</S> the wife<S>802</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>, Reuel<S>7467</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Bashemath<S>1315</S> the wife<S>802</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Eliphaz<S>464</S> were Teman<S>8487</S>, Omar<S>201</S>, Zepho<S>6825</S>, and Gatam<S>1609</S>, and Kenaz<S>7073</S>. <sup>Zepho: or, Zephi</sup>
And Timna<S>8555</S> was concubine<S>6370</S> to Eliphaz<S>464</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> son<S>1121</S>; and she bare<S>3205</S> to Eliphaz<S>464</S> Amalek<S>6002</S>: these were the sons<S>1121</S> of Adah<S>5711</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>.
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Reuel<S>7467</S>; Nahath<S>5184</S>, and Zerah<S>2226</S>, Shammah<S>8048</S>, and Mizzah<S>4199</S>: these were the sons<S>1121</S> of Bashemath<S>1315</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>.
And these were the sons<S>1121</S> of Aholibamah<S>173</S>, the daughter<S>1323</S> of Anah<S>6034</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Zibeon<S>6649</S>, Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>: and she bare<S>3205</S> to Esau<S>6215</S> Jeush<S>3274</S>, and Jaalam<S>3281</S>, and Korah<S>7141</S>.
These were dukes<S>441</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>: the sons<S>1121</S> of Eliphaz<S>464</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> son of Esau<S>6215</S>; duke<S>441</S> Teman<S>8487</S>, duke<S>441</S> Omar<S>201</S>, duke<S>441</S> Zepho<S>6825</S>, duke<S>441</S> Kenaz<S>7073</S>,
Duke<S>441</S> Korah<S>7141</S>, duke<S>441</S> Gatam<S>1609</S>, and duke<S>441</S> Amalek<S>6002</S>: these are the dukes<S>441</S> that came of Eliphaz<S>464</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Edom<S>123</S>; these were the sons<S>1121</S> of Adah<S>5711</S>.
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Reuel<S>7467</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> son<S>1121</S>; duke<S>441</S> Nahath<S>5184</S>, duke<S>441</S> Zerah<S>2226</S>, duke<S>441</S> Shammah<S>8048</S>, duke<S>441</S> Mizzah<S>4199</S>: these are the dukes<S>441</S> that came of Reuel<S>7467</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Edom<S>123</S>; these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Bashemath<S>1315</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>.
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Aholibamah<S>173</S> Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>; duke<S>441</S> Jeush<S>3266</S>, duke<S>441</S> Jaalam<S>3281</S>, duke<S>441</S> Korah<S>7141</S>: these were the dukes<S>441</S> that came of Aholibamah<S>173</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Anah<S>6034</S>, Esau's<S>6215</S> wife<S>802</S>.
These are the sons<S>1121</S> of Esau<S>6215</S>, who is Edom<S>123</S>, and these are their dukes<S>441</S>.
These are the sons<S>1121</S> of Seir<S>8165</S> the Horite<S>2752</S>, who inhabited<S>3427</S> the land<S>776</S>; Lotan<S>3877</S>, and Shobal<S>7732</S>, and Zibeon<S>6649</S>, and Anah<S>6034</S>,
And Dishon<S>1787</S>, and Ezer<S>687</S>, and Dishan<S>1789</S>: these are the dukes<S>441</S> of the Horites<S>2752</S>, the children<S>1121</S> of Seir<S>8165</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Edom<S>123</S>.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Lotan<S>3877</S> were Hori<S>2753</S> and Hemam<S>1967</S>; and Lotan's<S>3877</S> sister<S>269</S> was Timna<S>8555</S>. <sup>Hemam: or, Homam</sup>
And the children<S>1121</S> of Shobal<S>7732</S> were these; Alvan<S>5935</S>, and Manahath<S>4506</S>, and Ebal<S>5858</S>, Shepho<S>8195</S>, and Onam<S>208</S>. <sup>Alvan: or, Alian</sup> <sup>Shepho: or, Shephi</sup>
And these are the children<S>1121</S> of Zibeon<S>6649</S>; both Ajah<S>345</S>, and Anah<S>6034</S>: this was that Anah<S>6034</S> that found<S>4672</S> the mules<S>3222</S> in the wilderness<S>4057</S>, as he fed<S>7462</S> the asses<S>2543</S> of Zibeon<S>6649</S> his father<S>1</S>.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Anah<S>6034</S> were these; Dishon<S>1787</S>, and Aholibamah<S>173</S> the daughter<S>1323</S> of Anah<S>6034</S>.
And these are the children<S>1121</S> of Dishon<S>1787</S>; Hemdan<S>2533</S>, and Eshban<S>790</S>, and Ithran<S>3506</S>, and Cheran<S>3763</S>. <sup>Hemdan: or, Amram</sup>
The children<S>1121</S> of Ezer<S>687</S> are these; Bilhan<S>1092</S>, and Zaavan<S>2190</S>, and Akan<S>6130</S>. <sup>Akan: or, Jakan</sup>
The children<S>1121</S> of Dishan<S>1789</S> are these; Uz<S>5780</S>, and Aran<S>765</S>.
These are the dukes<S>441</S> that came of the Horites<S>2752</S>; duke<S>441</S> Lotan<S>3877</S>, duke<S>441</S> Shobal<S>7732</S>, duke<S>441</S> Zibeon<S>6649</S>, duke<S>441</S> Anah<S>6034</S>,
Duke<S>441</S> Dishon<S>1787</S>, duke<S>441</S> Ezer<S>687</S>, duke<S>441</S> Dishan<S>1789</S>: these are the dukes<S>441</S> that came of Hori<S>2753</S>, among their dukes<S>441</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Seir<S>8165</S>.
And these are the kings<S>4428</S> that reigned<S>4427</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Edom<S>123</S>, before<S>6440</S> there reigned<S>4427</S> any king<S>4428</S> over the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
And Bela<S>1106</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Beor<S>1160</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in Edom<S>123</S>: and the name<S>8034</S> of his city<S>5892</S> was Dinhabah<S>1838</S>.
And Bela<S>1106</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Jobab<S>3103</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zerah<S>2226</S> of Bozrah<S>1224</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead.
And Jobab<S>3103</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Husham<S>2367</S> of the land<S>776</S> of Temani<S>8489</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead.
And Husham<S>2367</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Hadad<S>1908</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Bedad<S>911</S>, who smote<S>5221</S> Midian<S>4080</S> in the field<S>7704</S> of Moab<S>4124</S>, reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead: and the name<S>8034</S> of his city<S>5892</S> was Avith<S>5762</S>.
And Hadad<S>1908</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Samlah<S>8072</S> of Masrekah<S>4957</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead.
And Samlah<S>8072</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Saul<S>7586</S> of Rehoboth<S>7344</S> by the river<S>5104</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead.
And Saul<S>7586</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Baalhanan<S>1177</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Achbor<S>5907</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead.
And Baalhanan<S>1177</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Achbor<S>5907</S> died<S>4191</S>, and Hadar<S>1924</S> reigned<S>4427</S> in his stead: and the name<S>8034</S> of his city<S>5892</S> was Pau<S>6464</S>; and his wife's<S>802</S> name<S>8034</S> was Mehetabel<S>4105</S>, the daughter<S>1323</S> of Matred<S>4308</S>, the daughter<S>1323</S> of Mezahab<S>4314</S>. <sup>Hadar, Pau: or, Hadad, Pai: after his death was an Aristocracy</sup>
And these are the names<S>8034</S> of the dukes<S>441</S> that came of Esau<S>6215</S>, according to their families<S>4940</S>, after their places<S>4725</S>, by their names<S>8034</S>; duke<S>441</S> Timnah<S>8555</S>, duke<S>441</S> Alvah<S>5933</S>, duke<S>441</S> Jetheth<S>3509</S>, <sup>Alvah: or, Aliah</sup>
Duke<S>441</S> Aholibamah<S>173</S>, duke<S>441</S> Elah<S>425</S>, duke<S>441</S> Pinon<S>6373</S>,
Duke<S>441</S> Kenaz<S>7073</S>, duke<S>441</S> Teman<S>8487</S>, duke<S>441</S> Mibzar<S>4014</S>,
Duke<S>441</S> Magdiel<S>4025</S>, duke<S>441</S> Iram<S>5902</S>: these be the dukes<S>441</S> of Edom<S>123</S>, according to their habitations<S>4186</S> in the land<S>776</S> of their possession<S>272</S>: he is Esau<S>6215</S> the father<S>1</S> of the Edomites<S>123</S>. <sup>the Edomites: Heb. Edom</sup>
